features: Moisturizing Shampoo: Instantly smooths, restores and revitalizes dry hair with lasting moisture for incredibly soft, shiny hair;Suitable for all hair types
Soothing Green Tea Lemongrass Scent: The clean scent of green tea and herbaceous lemongrass intermingled with fresh ginger will leave you feeling calm and relaxed

Naturally Derived Ingredients: Enriched with our special blend of vitamins, pure essential oils and botanical extracts to lock in moisture and nourish dry hair. Toxin-free formula is paraben, sulfate, phosphate and gluten-free
Cruelty-Free Hair Care: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals is PETA-certified, 100% vegan and never tested on animals so you can feel good while using it

Economical & Eco-Friendly: Gallon refill size helps reduce plastic consumption and is perfect for salon backbars or refilling shower dispensers in locker rooms, hotels, spas or at home. 1 Gallon (128 fl. oz.)
body.description: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Island Tranquility Moisturizing Shampoo features a blend of aloe, flaxseed and vitamin B5 that smooths, restores and revitalizes hair with lasting moisture for incredibly soft, shiny hair. The unique formula is designed for all hair types and washes away clean without stripping hair of its natural oils. Moisturizing shampoo lathers into the hair and provides deep hydration to hair follicles. Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Moisturizing Shampoo is paraben-free, gluten-free, 100% vegan and cruelty-free. Ginger Lily Farms is PETA Certified.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Moisturizing Shampoo Our range of Moisturizing Shampoo offers a rich blend of ingredients to restore and revitalize hair. It leaves hair deeply hydrated, incredibly soft, and shiny with the antioxidant and healing properties of flaxseed and the moisturizing benefits of aloe, loaded with vitamin B5. Natural Spa Quality, Paraben, Phosphate and Sulfate Free. Perfect for facilities looking for value yet quality products. Our special formulation of naturally derived botanicals has no sulfates, phosphates or parabens. Vegan and Cruelty-free. Paraben, sulfate, phosphate, gluten, and cruelty-free 100% vegan Smooths, restores and revitalizes hair Recommended for commercial use

Moisturizing Shampoo Smooths, Restores and Revitalizes Hair Moisturizing shampoo smooths, restores and revitalizes hair with lasting moisture for incredibly soft, shiny hair. Suitable for all hair types. Chemical and Cruelty-Free Ginger Lily Farms Botanicals Moisturizing Shampoo is paraben, sulfate, phosphate, gluten, and cruelty-free. 100% vegan. Key Ingredients The Shampoo is formulated with vitamin B5, aloe and flaxseed to heal, moisturize, and hydrate hair. Apple Pear: Contains pure apple extract for a fresh fruity note.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy I found gallon shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 teenager daughters, so buying gallon shampoo and conditioner...I cannot believe I didn't know I could. This company rocks. Not only is it a money saver, but it's actually a great product. When I washed my hair with it there was so much soap lathering up. I'm very impressed and even the scents are great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a great value. The scent is pleasant and leaves your hair feeling clean and not heavy. The only negative is we felt like you need to use more to get a good lather for longer hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried to use more natural products and a friend recommended this product. I have long fine hair and usually products can weigh my hair down-not this one. It moisturizes with just the right moisture without weighing it down. The product is thick and does a great job with cleansing the hair. My hair feels healthier after I switched to this product. My whole family is using it. The value is wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT BUYBought this to
reviews.reviewText: bought this to use on kids slip and slide this summer. decided to use on self, keeping expectations low.great surprise, silky rich lather, pleasant smell, not drying to skin. great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this brand by all 3 of their products and love house off they are and that they don't leave the grimy residueon my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best shampoo I have ever used did not dry my hair like all other shampoos I have used pleasant sent and leaves hair feeling clean great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Scent is More Aloe Than I Expected
reviews.reviewText: I love their products, but some of the scents aren’t for me which is to be expected. This one smells more like Aloe to me than what I had planned. I’ve almost bought all the scents to try so here are my ratings so far:Apple and Pear 9/10 (smells like apples more than pears, but leaves a nice scent in the hair)Ocean Breeze 1/10 (even out of the container it smelled like a watered down mixed drink)Island Tranquility 7/10 (aloe scent)Citrus 8/10 (smells exactly like oranges if you’re into that - have yet to try it in my hair as I bought the body wash)Coco Mango 1/10 (smells like milk right before it expires, no mango scent at all)
